item.description:
The Sofra Bakery/Cafe, right on the border of Belmont and Cambridge, is a wonderful place for an exotic breakfast. . . but not usually on weekends, when the crowds can be difficult to deal with. We'd never go near it on a Sunday, but since so many people are out of town over Fourth of July weekend, we think it's worth a try if you are crazy enough to go out for breakfast on a Saturday morning.

So if you are feeling a bit adventurous, come join us! We are bypassing the usual reservation fee because this is a spur of the moment idea and we have no idea how it will play out.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll try to get a table outside. . . look for us there first!
item.name: Breakfast in Byzantium. . . er, Belmont
